text:
Singapore Minstrel
.
You’ve seen the nation’s wildest busker Roy Payamal on the streets; now get to know the man. This heartfelt ‘fantasy-documentary’ brings the nation’s wildest busker to life.
.
Free access to this film is only available till 1st June 2020: https://www.apart.sg/featured-season-7/ngxijie-singapore-minstrel
.
*Check out the Bonus Features too!
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason7 | #Singaporeminstrel
